brief: Develop an interactive learning platform for personalized student experiences.
business_problem: Educational institutions struggle to engage students with one-size-fits-all content. Tailored learning experiences are essential for improving retention and performance.
target_users: Students and educators using the learning platform
goals: Create user profiles to customize learning paths
Implement real-time progress tracking and feedback
Develop a resource library with search and filter options
deliverables: Fully functional web application with user authentication
API documentation for integration with third-party tools
User manual for educators on platform features
assessment_criteria: User engagement metrics, code maintainability, and alignment with educational standards

user_stories.title: Customize learning paths for students
user_stories.description: As a student, I want to have a personalized learning path so I can focus on my strengths and weaknesses.
acceptance_criteria: Given I log in, when I access my profile, I see recommended courses based on my previous performance.
When I select a course, it updates my learning path accordingly.
The system prompts me to adjust my path based on new interests or goals.

user_stories.title: Track progress in real-time
user_stories.description: As a student, I want to track my progress in real-time so I can stay motivated.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am on my dashboard, when I complete a module, my progress updates immediately.
I receive notifications for milestones achieved and upcoming deadlines.
Progress data is visualized in an easy-to-understand format.

user_stories.title: Access a searchable resource library
user_stories.description: As a student, I want to access a resource library so I can find materials relevant to my courses.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am in the resource section, when I search for a topic, relevant materials appear instantly.
I can filter resources by type, difficulty, and subject.
Each resource includes a brief description and user ratings.
